Title: A Plan Comes Together
Description:
We have our work cut out for us, $n. But I think, with Dagran's help, we can break this down and tackle it piece by piece.

Why don't you take us through what we've learned so far.
ObjectivesText: Go over the plan with Brinthe and Dagran.
CompletionText: We're some of the greatest minds in... well Gundargaz, at least. We can figure this out.
RewardText:
We need to secure the Waterworks and get the Shadowvein Excavation site up and running before we head back to the factory.

Let's get to work.

Objectives.Text: Point out the Shadowvein Extraction Site
